Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    Capital Projects

    All major infrastructure and information technology projects with a budget of $25 million or more that are currently active (in the design, procurement, or construction phase).

    Capital Projects Tracker

    A listing of all capital projects managed by NYC Parks, and a timeline for their completion. Supporting documentation can be found at the following link (http://www.nycgovparks.org/bigapps/desc/DP...
